Section.Catchline: Action on plan of conversion by converting partnership.

Subsection.Text: A plan of conversion must be consented to by all of the partners of a converting partnership. The consents required by this subsection must be in, or evidenced by, a record.

Subject to s. 620.8920 and any contractual rights, after a conversion is approved, and at any time before a filing is made under s. 620.8914, a converting partnership may amend the plan or abandon the planned conversion:

Paragraph.Text: Except as prohibited by the plan, by the same consent as was required to approve the plan.
